item.title: Protect Against OWASP API Top 10 Security Risks Using Defender for APIs
item.description:
Overview The Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) Foundation is a nonprofit foundation dedicated to improving software security through community-led open-source projects, education, and transparency. The OWASP API Security Project focuses on strategies and solutions to understand and mitigate the unique vulnerabilities and security risks of APIs. In this post, we'll dive into how Defender for APIs (a plan provided by Microsoft Defender for Cloud) provides security coverage for the OWASP API Top 10 security risks.
